availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, clerk. Buffalo, West Virginia, native. Married to Martha Ann Posey on February 20, 1861. Father of George F. Beatty. Clerk in Henderson County in 1860. Confirmed as a notary public in Jefferson County on February 5, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, p. 52.
William E. Connelley, *A Standard History of Kansas and Kansans (Chicago : Lewis, 1918), 5v.
KYR-0001-017-0062.
